resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request #7118:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7118


   Travis CI uses different partition for workspace (/) and
   Docker (/var/lib/docker/) and /var/lib/docker/ doesn't have enough
   disk space. If we use directory in host as build directory, we can use
   disk space in /.

To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the

fields.summary: [Packaging][deb][RPM] Use directory in host as build directory
